channel_group.description: Code of the distribution channel group

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

code.description:
The code value. This value you will see in reservations as market code and in other
            resources like the revenue buckets in transactions

default.description:
This attribute tells you if this code is the default code for the specific type or not.
            Not all the types of codes need to have a default code

name.description: The name of the code that usually is more human readable

type.description: The type or category of the code

code.description:
The code value. This value you will see in reservations as market code and in other
            resources like the revenue buckets in transactions

default.description:
This attribute tells you if this code is the default code for the specific type or not.
            Not all the types of codes need to have a default code

name.description: The name of the code that usually is more human readable

parent.description:
Some codes can have a hierarchie and a child code always points to
            the parent

type.description: The type or category of the code

code.description:
Return all codes matching the code. Only the combinication of code and type
            make a code unique, so it can happen that you get multiple codes with the same
            value for different types

type.description: Return all codes available for the specified type

codes.description: The list of codes matching the defined filter criteria

from.description: Start Date for this time period

to.description: End Date for this time period

adjustment.description: Mode for the calculation of the daily rates adjustment

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

arrival_date.description: The arrival date of the guests

confirmation_id.description:
he confirmation id for the booking which the guest can use to check in on the kiosk, add the 
            booking to the mobile app etc. It is used as identifier for all reservations done with the 
            same booking request

departure_date.description: The departure date of the guests

reservation_number.description: The reservation number of the reservation

reservation_status.description: The current status of this reservation

EmbeddedRoomType.description:
Basic data for a room type. To get the full details please follow the self link
            from the links collection

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

EmbeddedRoomType.title: EmbeddedRoomType

EmbeddedRoomTypeSimple.description: Contains only a basic information about a room type. No cross-links available as well.
EmbeddedRoomTypeSimple.title: EmbeddedRoomTypeSimple

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

room_type.description: Room type of the room. Contains only the basic properties of the room type

updated.description: Timestamp of when the room was changed the last time

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

access_control.description: List of distribution channel groups and channels the rateplan is sold through

active.description: Defines if the rateplan has been ended and is expired

active_periods.description:
List of active periods. Arrival and departure day for reservations based on this rateplan need to
            fit into one of these time periods

booking_periods.description: List of booking periods. During these time periods the rateplan is sold

commissionable.description: Defines if this rateplan is setup with a commission

day_use.description: Defines if this rateplan is used for day use reservations

derivation.description:
If this rateplan is derived from a base rateplan you will see some details about
            the base rateplan and the mode for the adjustment of the daily rates

derived_rateplans.description: Details about all the derived rateplans if any

folio_name.description:
Text defining how the room charges for this rateplan are shown on the folio and
            invoice for the guest

included_services.description: List of codes for the included services sold with this rateplan

market_code.description: The code of the market segment the rate plan is linked to

noshow_policy.description: The code of the noshow policy for this rateplan

restrictions.description: Generic rateplan restrictions valid on all booking periods

room_types.description: List of all room types sold through this rateplan

suspended.description:
Defines if a rateplan is suspended and no new reservations can be created for this
            rateplan at the moment

taxes_included.description: Defines if the daily rates include VAT or not

updated.description: Timestamp of when the rateplan was changed the last time

visibility.description: Defines if this rateplan is visible to the public or only for specific customers

adults.description: Specifies number of adults the returned rooms will have to be able to house. The default value is 1.

amenities.description:
Return result only for rooms having all of the given amenities. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            amenity codes.

from.description:
Rooms returned will not be assigned to a reservation or be under maintenance between this date
            and the specified to date. Still there could be departing reservations or ending maintenances
            for this date.

includeOutOfService.description:
Should rooms that are set OutOfService in the defined time period be returned as available. By default
            they are not.

locations.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified locations. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            location codes.

roomTypes.description: Return result only for rooms for the given room types. Allows to pass a comma-separated list of room types.

to.description:
Rooms returned will not be assigned to a reservation or be under maintenance between the specified
            from date and this date. Still there could be arriving reservations or beginning maintenances
            for this date.

views.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified views. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            view codes.

Expand.description: You can expand the supplements per room type on demand. By default they are not shown.

From.description: Defines the last business day you would like to get rates for. The maximum time span between from´and to is limited to 365 days.

To.description: Defines the first business day you would like to get rates for.

amenities.description:
Return result only for rooms having all of the given amenities. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            amenity codes.

conditions.description: Return results only for rooms that have the given room condition status.

locations.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified locations. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            location codes.

maintenances.description: Return results only for rooms that have the given maintenance status.

occupancy.description: Return results only for rooms that have the given frontdesk ocuppancy status.

roomTypes.description: Return result only for rooms for the given room types. Allows to pass a comma-separated list of room types.

views.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified views. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            view codes.

city.description: The city the hotel is located in

country.description: The country the hotel is located. The country code is in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format (see: http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes/iso_3166_code_lists/country_names_and_code_elements.htm)

current_business_day.description: Return the current business day of the hotel in the ISO-8601 format "YYYY-MM-DD"

desc.description: The descriptive text for the the hotel

email.description: The email address of the hotel

fax.description: The fax number of the hotel

latitude.description: The latitude for the geolocation of the hotel. This allows you to show the hotel on a map

longitude.description: The longitude for the geolocation of the hotel. This allows you to show the hotel on a map

phone.description: The main phone number to call the hotel

postal_code.description: The postal code of the hotel

state.description: The state the hotel is located in

street.description: The street address of the hotel

updated.description: Timestamp of when the hotel was changed the last time

url.description: The homepage URL of the hotel

utc_offset.description:
The current time offset of the hotel to UTC. This is taking into account daylight saving times and shows the offset for the time the request is handled. The response
            will be in the format of "UTC±hh:mm". If there is no offset to UTC it will be shown as "UTC+00:00"

LinkObject.description: A Link Object represents a hyperlink from the containing resource to a URI.

deprecation.description:
<para>The "deprecation" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its presence indicates that the link is to be deprecated (i.e.
            removed) at a future date.  Its value is a URL that SHOULD provide
            further information about the deprecation.
            A client SHOULD provide some notification (for example, by logging a
            warning message) whenever it traverses over a link that has this
            property.  The notification SHOULD include the deprecation property's
            value so that a client maintainer can easily find information about
            the deprecation.</para>

href.description:
<para>The "href" property is REQUIRED.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value is either a URI [RFC3986] or a URI Template [RFC6570].
            If the value is a URI Template then the Link Object SHOULD have a
            "templated" attribute whose value is true.</para>

hreflang.description:
<para>The "hreflang" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value is a string and is intended for indicating the language of
            the target resource (as defined by [RFC5988]).</para>

name.description:
<para>The "name" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value MAY be used as a secondary key for selecting Link Objects
            which share the same relation type.</para>

profile.description:
<para>The "profile" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value is a string which is a URI that hints about the profile.</para>

templated.description:
<para>The "templated" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value is boolean and SHOULD be true when the Link Object's "href"
            property is a URI Template.
            Its value SHOULD be considered false if it is undefined or any other
            value than true.</para>

title.description:
<para>The "title" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value is a string and is intended for labelling the link with a
            human-readable identifier (as defined by [RFC5988]).</para>

type.description:
<para>The "type" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value is a string used as a hint to indicate the media type
            expected when dereferencing the target resource.</para>

LinkObject.title: LinkObject

Defines if a rateplan is suspended and no new reservations can be created for this

adjustment.description: Mode for the calculation of the daily rates adjustment

value.description: The value the rate of the base rateplan is adjusted by based on the calculation mode

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

base_price.description:
The price for this business day for the default room type and occupancy of one adult. The price is
            only available for base rateplans. Please be aware that it might be the case that the default room
            type is not sold by the rateplan. Nevertheless the supplements will always be added to the price for 
            the default room type and one adult

derivation.description: Information on how the rate is derived from its base rateplan

per_person_surcharge.description: The surcharge per additional adult staying in the room. It is only available on base rateplans

room_type_supplements.description: List of supplements added to the price per room type

baseRateplan.description: Return all rateplans having the specified rateplan as base rateplan

channelCode.description: Return all rateplans sold through the specified channel

channelGroup.description: Return all rateplans that are sold through at least one channel out of the specified channel group

commissionable.description: Return all rateplans having commisionable status

group.description: Return all rateplans belonging to the specified rateplan group

includedServices.description: Return all rateplans having at least one of the specified services included

marketCodes.description: Return all rateplans having one of the specified values as a market code

roomTypes.description: Return all rateplans by which at least one of the specified room types are sold

sellingStatus.description:
Specify which rateplans to return. If you do not specify a value you will by default get active
            rateplans.

_count.description: The number of items matching your request in total for all pages.

From.description: Defines the last business day you would like to get rates for. The maximum time span between from´and to is limited to 365 days.

To.description: Defines the first business day you would like to get rates for.

_count.description: The number of items matching your request in total for all pages.

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

rates.description: The list of rates, cancellation policy and minimum guarantee per business day.

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

leadtime_to_book.description: Days this rateplan needs to be booked in advance. This value is mutual exclusive to the max_advance_booking and if no limit is set it is omitted

max_advance_booking.description: Days this rateplan can be booked in advance. This value is mutual exclusive to the leadtime_to_book and if no limit is set it is omitted

Room.description: Represents a room for a property.

amenities.description: List of amenities for the room

beddings.description: Provides information about available beds in the room

expected_occupancy.description: The common amount of persons for the room

extra_bed_allowed.description: Is there an extra bed allowed in the room

locations.description: List of locations for the room

max_persons.description: Maximum number of allowed persons in the room

min_persons.description: Minimum number of allowed persons in the room

reservations.description:
Current reservation(s) for the room. It shows reservations due to arrive today and the one still inhouse.
            If there is a day-use reservation assigned for today it can show you up to 3 reservations. One that will
            depart today, the day-use reservqation for today and the one due to arrive

room_type.description: Room type of the room. Contains only the basic properties of the room type

updated.description: Timestamp of when the room was changed the last time

views.description: List of views for the room

Room.title: Room

count.description: Number of available beds of the specified type

_count.description: The number of items matching your request in total for all pages.

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources

from.description: Start date of the current maintenance work

reason.description: A description about the reason for the ongoing maintenance work

to.description: End date of the current maintenance work

frontdesk_occupancy.description:
The frontdesk occupancy is set by reservation checkin and checkout. It can differ from the
            housekeeping occupancy

housekeeping_occupancy.description:
The housekeeping occupancy status is defined by the housekeeping staff. Usually it matches the
            frontdesk occupancy, but sometimes the reservation is still inhouse, but it looks like there is no
            guest in the room anymore. Then the statuses can differ.

maintenance.description: Information about current ongoing room maintenance

RoomType.description: Represent a room type for a property

amenities.description: List of amenities for the room type

bedding_type.description: The type of bed for the room type

created.description: Timestamp the room type was created

default.description: Specifies if the room type is the default room type of the hotel

expected_occupancy.description: The common amount of persons for the room

facilities.description: List of facilities for the room type

max_persons.description: Maximum number of allowed persons for that room type

min_persons.description: Minimum number of allowed persons for that room type

updated.description: Timestamp of when the room type was changed the last time

views.description: List of views for the room type

code.description: The code of the room type

default.description: Specifies if the room type is the default room type of the hotel

supplements.description: The supplements per adults in the room. The per person surcharge will be added on top

adjustment.description: Mode for the calculation of the supplement value

adults.description: The number of adults per room

supplement.description: The amount or percentage that will be added for this room type and number of adults per room

_count.description: Returns the total count for all items matching the query parameters. If none is matching it will return 0.

actions.title: Hotels_GetHotels
actions.description: Load the details about all the hotels your application has access to.

actions.title: Hotels_GetHotel
actions.description: Load the details about the specified hotel.

actions.title: Codes_GetCodes
actions.description:
With this call you can find codes for a hotel by type or code. By default and without any filter criteria
            defined it will return you all available codes.

hotelId.description: The hotel id you are trying to find codes for.

code.description:
Return all codes matching the code. Only the combinication of code and type
            make a code unique, so it can happen that you get multiple codes with the same
            value for different types

type.description: Return all codes available for the specified type

actions.title: Codes_GetCode
actions.description: Read the details about a specific code available for the defined hotel.

hotelId.description: The hotel id the code available for.

id.description: The code identifier you want to see details for.

actions.title: RatePlans_GetRateplans
actions.description:
With this call you can find rateplans for a hotel by different filters. By default and without any filter criteria
            defined it will return you all active rateplans.

hotelId.description: The hotel id you are trying to find rateplans for.

sellingStatus.description:
Specify which rateplans to return. If you do not specify a value you will by default get active
            rateplans.

commissionable.description: Return all rateplans having commisionable status

group.description: Return all rateplans belonging to the specified rateplan group

baseRateplan.description: Return all rateplans having the specified rateplan as base rateplan

channelGroup.description: Return all rateplans that are sold through at least one channel out of the specified channel group

channelCode.description: Return all rateplans sold through the specified channel

marketCodes.description: Return all rateplans having one of the specified values as a market code

roomTypes.description: Return all rateplans by which at least one of the specified room types are sold

includedServices.description: Return all rateplans having at least one of the specified services included

inlinecount.description: Return total number of items for a given filter criteria.

actions.title: RatePlans_GetRateplansCount
actions.description: Get the count of all rateplans in the hotel matching the given filter criteria.

hotelId.description: The hotel you are counting the rateplans for.

sellingStatus.description:
Specify which rateplans to return. If you do not specify a value you will by default get active
            rateplans.

commissionable.description: Return all rateplans having commisionable status

group.description: Return all rateplans belonging to the specified rateplan group

baseRateplan.description: Return all rateplans having the specified rateplan as base rateplan

marketCodes.description: Return all rateplans having one of the specified values as a market code

roomTypes.description: Return all rateplans by which at least one of the specified room types are sold

includedServices.description: Return all rateplans having at least one of the specified services included

actions.title: RatePlans_GetRateplan
actions.description: Read the details about a specific rateplan for the defined hotel.

hotelId.description: The hotel id the rateplan belongs to.

rateplanCode.description: The code of the rateplan you want to see details for.

actions.title: RatePlans_GetRates
actions.description:
With this call you can read the daily rates setup including the cancellation policy and minimum guarantee per day for the
            specified rateplan. You can specify a timeperiod to read the daily rates for. The rateplan needs to be active for at least
            one business day in the defined time period and have rates loaded.

hotelId.description: The hotel id the rateplan belongs to.

rateplanCode.description: The code of the rateplan you want to see details for.

expand.description: You can expand the supplements per room type on demand. By default they are not shown.

from.description: Defines the last business day you would like to get rates for. The maximum time span between from´and to is limited to 365 days.

to.description: Defines the first business day you would like to get rates for.

inlinecount.description: Return total number of items for a given filter criteria.

actions.title: RatePlans_PatchRates

hotelId.description: The hotel id the rateplan belongs to.

rateplanCode.description: The code of the rateplan you want to update the daily rate details for.

from.description: Defines the last business day you would like to get rates for. The maximum time span between from´and to is limited to 365 days.

to.description: Defines the first business day you would like to get rates for.

actions.title: RatePlans_GetRatesCount
actions.description: Get the count of all active and loaded daily rates for the defined rateplan in a specified time period.

hotelId.description: The hotel id the rateplan belongs to.

rateplanCode.description: The code of the rateplan you want to count daily rates for.

from.description: Defines the last business day you would like to get rates for. The maximum time span between from´and to is limited to 365 days.

to.description: Defines the first business day you would like to get rates for.

actions.title: RatePlans_GetRate
actions.description: Read the setup of the daily rate for the defined rateplan for that specific business day.

hotelId.description: The hotel id the rateplan belongs to.

rateplanCode.description: The code of the rateplan you want to see details for.

businessDay.description: The business day you want to get the rate setup for.

actions.title: RatePlans_PatchRate

hotelId.description: The hotel id the rateplan belongs to.

rateplanCode.description: The code of the rateplan you want to update the daily rate details for.

businessDay.description: The business day of the daily rate you want to update.

actions.description: With this call you can load the details about a all available room types for the specified hotel.

actions.description: With this call you can load the details about a specific room type in the hotel.

hotelId.description: The hotel id the room type belongs to.

code.description: The code of the room type you want to see details for.

actions.title: Rooms_GetRooms
actions.description:
Find all rooms for the hotel that match the specified filter criteria. The filtering will be done based on the current state of
            the rooms.

hotelId.description: The hotel you are trying to find rooms for.

occupancy.description: Return results only for rooms that have the given frontdesk ocuppancy status.

conditions.description: Return results only for rooms that have the given room condition status.

maintenances.description: Return results only for rooms that have the given maintenance status.

roomTypes.description: Return result only for rooms for the given room types. Allows to pass a comma-separated list of room types.

amenities.description:
Return result only for rooms having all of the given amenities. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            amenity codes.

views.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified views. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            view codes.

locations.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified locations. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            location codes.

inlinecount.description: Return total number of items for a given filter criteria.

locations.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified locations. You can provide a comma seperated list of

actions.description: Request available rooms using a given criteria.

from.description:
Rooms returned will not be assigned to a reservation or be under maintenance between this date
            and the specified to date. Still there could be departing reservations or ending maintenances
            for this date.

to.description:
Rooms returned will not be assigned to a reservation or be under maintenance between the specified
            from date and this date. Still there could be arriving reservations or beginning maintenances
            for this date.

includeOutOfService.description:
Should rooms that are set OutOfService in the defined time period be returned as available. By default
            they are not.

roomTypes.description: Return result only for rooms for the given room types. Allows to pass a comma-separated list of room types.

amenities.description:
Return result only for rooms having all of the given amenities. You can provide a comma seperated list of

views.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified views. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            view codes.

locations.description:
Return result only for rooms having at least one of the specified locations. You can provide a comma seperated list of 
            location codes.

actions.title: Rooms_GetRoom
actions.description: With this call you can load the details about a specific room in the hotel. It will show you the current status of the room.

hotelId.description: The hotel id the room belongs to.

roomNumber.description: The room number you want to see details for.

hotelId.description: The hotel id the room belongs to.

roomNumber.description: The room number of the room you would like to update.
